org.mapsforge.map.scalebar

Class MapScaleBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapsforge.map.scalebar.MapScaleBar

  • public class MapScaleBar
extends Object
    A MapScaleBar displays the ratio of a distance on the map to the corresponding distance on the ground.
